title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Cognitive Load Management Strategies in Remote Education: Applying the ADIDAS Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Fundamental Knowledge in Social Studies
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Design remote teaching materials by applying the six stages of the ADDIE model: analysis, design, development, implementation, evaluation, and sharing
Produce learner-friendly digital content by leveraging cognitive load theory (extraneous load reduction)
Implement blended learning strategies effective in smartphone environments and conduct project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
